title: 1.7.10旧存档选不中
author: wo237326057
txt_content:
1.7.10版本，原版和其他加了mod的，选存档界面无法点击到旧存档，只能创建新的存档，但退出后，下次也无法选择进入。还有带上下拉条的项目，比如说语言选择界面、mod查看界面、游戏内的附魔台界面的选项也无法点击（选中）。

百度后也有人有同样问题，但没有解决办法。
因为游戏没有崩溃所以没有崩溃日志，只有自带的控制台有一些错误，但看不懂，希望各位大大能帮我解决下。




[0714/183317:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(178)] game/bao (Client thread) info LWJGL Version: 2.9.1

[0714/183319:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(178)] game/game () error If on Windows, make sure to provide all of the necessary dll's as specified in the twitchsdk README. Also, make sure to set the PATH environment variable to point to the directory containing the dll's.
  <log4j:Event logger="bao" timestamp="1500028399169" level="ERROR" thread="Client thread">
    <log4j:Message><![CDATA[Couldn't initialize twitch stream]]></log4j:Message>
  </log4j:Event>

[0714/183319:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(178)] launcher/monitor (Process Monitor) error expected <

[0714/183319:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(178)] game/brg (Client thread) info Reloading ResourceManager: Default

[0714/183319:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(178)] game/game () error Starting up SoundSystem...
Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
    (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)
OpenAL initialized.

  <log4j:Event logger="btj" timestamp="1500028399901" level="INFO" thread="Sound Library Loader">
    <log4j:Message><![CDATA[Sound engine started]]></log4j:Message>
  </log4j:Event>

[0714/183319:INFO:GameCallbacks.cpp(178)] launcher/monitor (Process Monitor) error expected <

replies.author: 小五heart
replies.txt_content: 把存档换到另一个客户端试试

replies.author: wo237326057
replies.txt_content:
小五heart 发表于 2017-7-14 21:58
把存档换到另一个客户端试试
这台电脑所有的1.7.10的都没用= =，启动器，客户端都重新下了n遍了

replies.author: wo237326057
replies.txt_content:
求大佬帮忙啊，电脑重装都没用，应该是win10更新的什么有冲突。。
求大佬帮忙

replies.author: wo237326057
replies.txt_content:
有一个崩溃报告，求解答

replies.txt_content: 是win10更新了和java冲突，把win10版本降回以前版本就行，或等以后win10/java更新
